revised_title: Obituary Notices of Benjamin A. Gould and Edward Ballard
tldr: This article pays tribute to Benjamin A. Gould, a prominent astronomer, and Edward Ballard, a renowned sanitarian, both of whom made significant contributions to their respective fields. Gould is remembered for his work at the Cordoba Observatory, while Ballard's efforts in public health, particularly as Medical Officer of Health for Islington, are highlighted.
